description.native_language: Learn basic greetings like 'hello' and 'goodbye'.
description.target_language: Aprender saludos básicos como 'hola' y 'adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'hola' in a greeting context
User produces 'adiós' in a farewell context

description.native_language: Learn how to count from 1 to 10.
description.target_language: Aprender a contar del 1 al 10.

evaluation_criteria: User produces number words correctly from 'uno' to 'diez'
User matches number word with correct quantity of objects

description.native_language: Learn basic color names.
description.target_language: Aprender nombres de colores básicos.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'rojo', 'azul', 'verde', and 'amarillo' in context
User uses color words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn how to affirm and negate.
description.target_language: Aprender cómo afirmar y negar.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'sí' to affirm
User produces 'no' to negate

description.native_language: Learn names of basic objects like 'book' and 'table'.
description.target_language: Aprender nombres de objetos básicos como 'libro' y 'mesa'.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'libro', 'mesa', 'silla' in context
User uses object words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Identify days of the week and months.
description.target_language: Identificar días de la semana y meses.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'lunes' through 'domingo' in context
User identifies 'enero' through 'diciembre' in context

description.native_language: Learn basic family member names.
description.target_language: Aprender nombres básicos de miembros de la familia.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'madre', 'padre', 'hermano', 'hermana' in context
User uses family words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn names of common foods.
description.target_language: Aprender nombres de alimentos comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'manzana', 'pan', 'agua' in context
User uses food words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn basic weather terms.
description.target_language: Aprender términos básicos del tiempo.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'sol', 'lluvia', 'nieve' in context
User uses weather words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn basic directional words.
description.target_language: Aprender palabras direccionales básicas.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'izquierda', 'derecha', 'adelante' in context
User uses direction words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn basic shopping vocabulary.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario básico de compras.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'precio', 'dinero', 'comprar' in context
User uses shopping words in simple sentences

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to daily routines.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con las rutinas diarias.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'despertarse', 'desayunar', 'trabajar' in context
User uses routine words in sentences about daily activities

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to hobbies.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con los pasatiempos.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'leer', 'pintar', 'jugar' in context
User uses hobby words in sentences about personal interests

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary for describing people and things.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario para describir personas y cosas.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'alto', 'bajo', 'bonito' in context
User uses descriptive words in sentences about people or objects

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to travel.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con los viajes.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'avión', 'hotel', 'pasaporte' in context
User uses travel words in sentences about trips or vacations

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to work.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con el trabajo.

evaluation_criteria: User identifies 'oficina', 'jefe', 'reunión' in context
User uses work words in sentences about job-related activities

description.native_language: Learn how to use basic greetings like 'hola' and 'adiós'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar saludos básicos como 'hola' y 'adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'hola' and 'adiós' correctly in greeting and farewell context

description.native_language: Learn how to say 'yes' and 'no' in Spanish.
description.target_language: Aprender a decir 'sí' y 'no' en español.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'sí' for affirmations
User uses 'no' for negations

name.target_language: Introducción a los Sustantivos con Género

description.native_language: Learn about gendered nouns with 'el' and 'la'.
description.target_language: Aprender sobre sustantivos con género usando 'el' y 'la'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'el' with masculine nouns
User uses 'la' with feminine nouns

description.native_language: Learn the numbers from 1 to 10 in Spanish.
description.target_language: Aprender los números del 1 al 10 en español.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly identifies and uses numbers 1-10

description.native_language: Learn courtesy phrases like 'please' and 'thank you'.
description.target_language: Aprender frases de cortesía como 'por favor' y 'gracias'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'por favor' appropriately in requests
User uses 'gracias' appropriately in thanking

description.native_language: Learn to use 'el', 'la', 'un', 'una'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar 'el', 'la', 'un', 'una'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'el' and 'la' with correct gender
User uses 'un' and 'una' with correct gender

name.native_language: Basic Present Tense of Regular Verbs

description.native_language: Learn to conjugate regular verbs like 'hablar', 'comer', 'vivir'.
description.target_language: Aprender a conjugar verbos regulares como 'hablar', 'comer', 'vivir'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates '-ar' verbs in present tense
User correctly conjugates '-er' verbs in present tense
User correctly conjugates '-ir' verbs in present tense

description.native_language: Learn to form yes/no questions in Spanish.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar preguntas de sí/no en español.

evaluation_criteria: User forms questions with '¿Eres tú?'
User forms questions with '¿Es él?'

description.native_language: Learn basic pronouns like 'yo', 'tú', 'él', 'ella'.
description.target_language: Aprender pronombres básicos como 'yo', 'tú', 'él', 'ella'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'yo' in sentences
User correctly uses 'tú' in sentences
User correctly uses 'él' and 'ella' in sentences

description.native_language: Learn to use simple adjectives with correct gender agreement.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar adjetivos simples con concordancia de género correcta.

evaluation_criteria: User uses masculine adjectives correctly with masculine nouns
User uses feminine adjectives correctly with feminine nouns

name.native_language: Present Tense Conjugation of Regular Verbs
name.target_language: Conjugación del Presente de Verbos Regulares

description.native_language: Master conjugation of regular -ar, -er, -ir verbs in present tense.
description.target_language: Dominar la conjugación de verbos regulares -ar, -er, -ir en presente.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates '-ar' verbs in present tense
User correctly conjugates '-er' verbs in present tense
User correctly conjugates '-ir' verbs in present tense

description.native_language: Learn the differences between 'ser' and 'estar'.
description.target_language: Aprender las diferencias entre 'ser' y 'estar'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'ser' correctly for characteristics
User uses 'estar' correctly for conditions

description.native_language: Learn to negate sentences using 'no'.
description.target_language: Aprender a negar oraciones usando 'no'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly negates sentences by placing 'no' before the verb

description.native_language: Learn basic question words like 'qué', 'quién', 'dónde', 'cuándo'.
description.target_language: Aprender palabras básicas de pregunta como 'qué', 'quién', 'dónde', 'cuándo'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'qué' correctly in questions
User uses 'dónde' correctly in questions
User uses 'cuándo' correctly in questions

description.native_language: Learn to use possessive adjectives like 'mi', 'tu', 'su'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar adjetivos posesivos como 'mi', 'tu', 'su'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'mi' correctly to indicate possession
User uses 'tu' correctly to indicate possession

name.native_language: Common Irregular Verbs in Present Tense

description.native_language: Learn to conjugate common irregular verbs like 'ir', 'tener', 'hacer'.
description.target_language: Aprender a conjugar verbos irregulares comunes como 'ir', 'tener', 'hacer'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates 'ir' in present tense
User correctly conjugates 'tener' in present tense
User correctly conjugates 'hacer' in present tense

description.native_language: Learn to use the simple past tense of regular verbs.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar el pretérito simple de verbos regulares.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates '-ar' verbs in past tense
User correctly conjugates '-er' verbs in past tense
User correctly conjugates '-ir' verbs in past tense

description.native_language: Learn to use basic conjunctions like 'y', 'o', 'pero'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar conjunciones básicas como 'y', 'o', 'pero'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'y' correctly to join sentences
User uses 'o' correctly to offer choices
User uses 'pero' correctly to contrast ideas

example_correct.native_language: I have a dog and a cat.
example_correct.target_language: Tengo un perro y un gato.

example_correct.native_language: Do you want tea or coffee?

example_incorrect.native_language: I have a dog and a cat.
example_incorrect.target_language: Tengo un perro o un gato.

example_incorrect.native_language: Do you want tea or coffee?

name.native_language: Introduction to Gustar and Similar Verbs
name.target_language: Introducción a Gustar y Verbos Similares

description.native_language: Learn to use 'gustar' and similar verbs correctly.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar 'gustar' y verbos similares correctamente.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'gustar' correctly with indirect object pronouns

name.native_language: Past Tense: Distinction between Pretérito and Imperfecto
name.target_language: Pasado: Distinción entre Pretérito e Imperfecto

description.native_language: Learn the differences between 'pretérito' and 'imperfecto'.
description.target_language: Aprender las diferencias entre 'pretérito' e 'imperfecto'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'pretérito' for completed actions
User uses 'imperfecto' for ongoing past actions

example_correct.native_language: I was walking when it started to rain.

example_incorrect.native_language: I was walking when it started to rain.
example_incorrect.target_language: Fui caminando cuando empezó a llover.

description.native_language: Learn to form the simple future tense using 'ir a + infinitive'.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar el futuro simple usando 'ir a + infinitivo'.

evaluation_criteria: User forms future tense correctly using 'ir a + infinitive'

description.native_language: Learn to form basic conditional sentences using 'si'.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar oraciones condicionales básicas usando 'si'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'si' correctly to form conditional sentences

example_correct.native_language: If it rains, we will stay home.
example_correct.target_language: Si llueve, nos quedaremos en casa.

example_correct.native_language: If you study, you will pass the exam.

example_incorrect.native_language: If it rains, we will stay home.
If you study, you will pass the exam.

description.native_language: Using basic greetings in appropriate contexts.
description.target_language: Usando saludos básicos en contextos apropiados.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Hola' to greet someone in a friendly context
User uses 'Adiós' to say goodbye

name.target_language: Saludos Según la Hora del Día

description.native_language: Using greetings appropriate for different times of the day.
description.target_language: Usando saludos apropiados para diferentes momentos del día.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Buenos días' in the morning
User uses 'Buenas tardes' in the afternoon
User uses 'Buenas noches' in the evening

description.native_language: Using basic farewell expressions appropriately.
description.target_language: Usando expresiones básicas de despedida apropiadamente.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Adiós' to say goodbye in informal settings
User uses 'Hasta luego' to indicate seeing someone later

description.native_language: Making basic introductions using simple phrases.
description.target_language: Haciendo introducciones básicas usando frases simples.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Me llamo [Name]' to introduce themselves
User uses 'Te presento a [Name]' to introduce someone else

description.native_language: Using 'tú' and 'usted' appropriately based on social context.
description.target_language: Usando 'tú' y 'usted' apropiadamente según el contexto social.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'tú' with peers and friends
User uses 'usted' with elders and authority figures

description.native_language: Using polite expressions like 'por favor' and 'gracias' in requests.
description.target_language: Usando expresiones educadas como 'por favor' y 'gracias' en solicitudes.

evaluation_criteria: User includes 'por favor' when making a request
User follows a request with 'gracias' when appropriate

description.native_language: Giving appropriate responses to common greetings.
description.target_language: Dando respuestas apropiadas a saludos comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User responds to 'Hola' with 'Hola'
User responds to '¿Cómo estás?' with 'Bien, gracias'

description.native_language: Using 'gracias' to express gratitude in various situations.
description.target_language: Usando 'gracias' para expresar gratitud en varias situaciones.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'gracias' after receiving help
User uses 'muchas gracias' to express extra gratitude

example_correct.native_language: Thank you very much for your help.

description.native_language: Using 'lo siento' and 'perdón' appropriately.
description.target_language: Usando 'lo siento' y 'perdón' apropiadamente.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'lo siento' to express regret
User uses 'perdón' to ask for forgiveness

description.native_language: Using appropriate expressions when leaving.
description.target_language: Usando expresiones apropiadas al irse.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Hasta mañana' to indicate seeing someone the next day
User uses 'Nos vemos' to indicate seeing someone later

description.native_language: Expressing simple opinions using 'me gusta' and 'no me gusta'.
description.target_language: Expresando opiniones simples usando 'me gusta' y 'no me gusta'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'me gusta' to express liking something
User uses 'no me gusta' to express disliking something

description.native_language: Using 'necesito' to express needs.
description.target_language: Usando 'necesito' para expresar necesidades.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'necesito' to express needing something
User forms sentences with 'necesito' and a noun
